---
title: "IMPD file check report"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
params:
  QCdf: NA
  FHX: NA
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(burnr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(glue)
df <- params$QCdf %>% 
  mutate(FHX = params$FHX)

```

There are `r nrow(df)` sites in this contribution.

There are `r length(df$FHX)` FHX objects.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
for (i in seq_len(nrow(df))) {
  site_df <- df[i, ]
  cat(
  knitr::knit_child('site_templ.Rmd', envir = environment(), quiet = TRUE)
  )
}
```
